content: whether you re gearing up for some holiday photos or preparing for a ride on the polar express this cheerful santa hat is essential for every member of the fam crocheted from the top down using straightforward increases it comes together quickly and requires very little finishing work attach a jingle bell to the pom-pom for an extra dash of christmas enchantment in this pattern you ll practice working in the round double_crochet and basic increasing this ad-free pdf is formatted for easy printing and mobile viewing it includes a written pattern and several photos santa hat pattern requires worsted weight category 4 yarn such as lion brand basic stitch and a super-bulky category 6 yarn such as lion brand go for faux or wool-ease thick & quick for a non-fur option this pattern originally appeared on make & do crew downloading - this listing is for the santa hat crochet pattern pdf only pattern pdf will be available for instant download upon payment copyright/making finished items - thank you for sharing my patterns and tutorials when you do it helps support the blog and my ability to create more patterns which by the way i seriously love to do so really i mean it thank you you may make items to sell with this pattern/tutorial in exchange i ask that you link back to makeanddocrew com do not use my photos as your own sales photos do not distribute my patterns/templates as your own permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing of any kind return policy - as this is a digital product i do not offer returns find more of our favorite crochet christmas patterns here https //makeanddocrew com/christmas-crochet-patterns/
